subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Geno Auriemma, the Connecticut women’s basketball coach, said Saturday that Elena Delle Donne, a 6-foot-5 forward who was the Huskies’ top recruit, had decided not to enroll at the university or play college basketball.
snippet: Geno Auriemma, the Connecticut women’s basketball coach, said Saturday that Elena Delle Donne, a 6-foot-5 forward who was the Huskies’ top recruit, had decided not to enroll at the university or play college basketball.
